messages.welcome:
Hi! I'm Telegram Defender.
I scan links that get posted for malware, and tell you more about news that's posted. Type /help for more information. or go to https://www.telegramdefender.com/
messages.help:
Hello! I'm Telegram Defender. 
Add me to your group or channel and I'll scan links people post for Malware. I'll also tell you more about the news sources. You can use the following commands: 
/settings short on/off - toggle short/long response mode. 
/settings mute on/off - mute or unmute me. 
/settings bias on/off - toggle bias-scan 
/help - Ask me for help.
messages.start:
Hi! I'm Telegram Defender.
I scan links that get posted for malware, and tell you more about news that's posted. Ask for /help for more informaiton.
